name: HalloweenChecker
0:
”Alexa, open Halloween Checker”
”is it Halloween yet”
”is today Halloween”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halloween checker
des: This skill allows you to check whether the current day is Halloween. Are you easily spooked? If so, this skill might not be for you. For the brave of heart however, test your mettle and ask the burning question: "Is today Halloween?" The answer might change your life forever....
